doc:
Mart McChesney https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mart_McChesney 0 Mart Dayne McChesney (January 27, 1954 – January 14, 1999) was an American television and film actor known for his appearances in Star Trek: The Next Generation as the tar creature, Armus, in "Skin of Evil" (1988), and as Sheliak in "The Ensigns of Command" (1989). For his appearances he wore heavy prosthetics and costumes. Footage of his appearance as Armus was re-used in the Star Trek: The Next Generation second-season episode "Shades of Gray" (1989). McChesney also appeared as Pete 'Maniac' Krizaniac in the horror film, Girls Nite Out (1982). McChesney was born in Abilene, Texas, and died in Hollywood, Los Angeles. Mart_Dayne_McChesney ( January_27_,_1954 – January_14_,_1999 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actor known for his_appearances in Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation as the_tar_creature , Armus , in " Skin of Evil " ( 1988 ) , and as Sheliak in " The_Ensigns of Command " ( 1989 ) . For his_appearances he wore heavy_prosthetics_and_costumes . Footage of his_appearance as Armus was_re-used in the_Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation_second-season_episode " Shades of Gray_"_(_1989_) . McChesney also appeared as Pete_'_Maniac_'_Krizaniac in the_horror_film , Girls_Nite Out (_1982_) . McChesney was_born in Abilene , Texas , and died in Hollywood , Los_Angeles .
